discover_best_chefs: Discover the Best Chefs, Right in Your Neighborhood
discover_best_chefs_desc: Experience authentic, homemade meals prepared with love by talented local chefs.
search_placeholder: Search by chef name or specialty...
customer_login_desc: Access your account to order your favorite meals.
chef_login_desc: Access your dashboard to manage your menu and orders.
customer_signup_desc: Join our community of food lovers.
chef_signup_desc: Share your passion and earn from your kitchen.
no_reviews_for_dish: Be the first to review this dish!
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef has not added any dishes to their menu yet.
delivery_information_desc: Please confirm your address for delivery.
login_required_desc: Please log in or create an account to place an order.
no_address_yet: You haven't set a delivery address yet.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is currently busy with other orders. You can still place your order, and it will be added to the queue.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders right now. Please check back later.
track_your_current_orders: Track your current orders and their status.
view_past_orders: View your past orders and leave reviews.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Start exploring and discover your next favorite meal.
last_5_reviews: Here are the last 5 reviews on your dishes.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, or remove dishes from your menu.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Add your culinary creations to start receiving orders.
dish_description_placeholder: Describe your dish in a way that makes mouths water.
delete_dish_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the dish '{{name}}' from your menu.
profile_desc: Update your personal and professional information.
bio_placeholder: Tell customers a little about yourself and your cooking style.
change_password_desc: For your security, choose a strong password that you don't use anywhere else.
logout_desc: Logging out will end your current session.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: The chef will review your order for {{quantity}}x {{dishName}} shortly.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: Your order has been waitlisted. The chef will get to it as soon as they can!
order_error_desc: You must be logged in and have a saved address to place an order.
coupon_invalid_error: This coupon code is not valid.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not valid for the selected dish.
update_error_desc: Could not save changes. Please try again.
password_changed_toast_desc: You can now use your new password to log in.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Please check your input and try again.
auth_incorrect_credentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one symbol.
auth_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
new_chef_bio: Passionate chef specializing in delicious {{specialty}} cuisine. Ready to bring amazing flavors to your table!
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for {{dishName}} is in the queue! The chef is busy but will get to it soon.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: {{customerName}} has placed an order and is waiting in your queue.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: The chef has started preparing your order for {{dishName}}.
order_ready_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is cooked and is being prepared for delivery.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} is out for delivery. Enjoy!
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your {{dishName}} has arrived. Don't forget to leave a review!
order_rejected_notification_desc: We're sorry, the chef was unable to fulfill your order for {{dishName}}.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
dish_image_required: Please upload an image for the dish.
prep_time_positive: Preparation time must be a positive number.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
wait_for_chefs: Please check back later as new chefs join.
try_different_search: Try a different name or specialty.
community_chat_desc: Chat with other food lovers in the community!
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Be the first to say something!
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a customer to access the community chat.
failed_to_send_message: Failed to send message. Please try again.
inappropriate_language_detected: Your message could not be sent. Please respect our community guidelines.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
validation_email_invalid_format: Please enter a valid email format.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
forgot_password_desc_initial: No problem. Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If an account with that email exists, a reset link has been sent.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature is disabled when using local browser storage for data.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage discount coupons for your customers.
no_coupons_desc: Create your first coupon to attract more customers.
specific_dishes_desc: Choose which of your dishes this coupon applies to.
no_dishes_to_add: You have no dishes to apply a coupon to.
coupon_code_min_length: Code must be at least 3 characters.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after start date.
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish for specific coupons.
pending_orders_desc: {{count}} orders were added to your queue while you were busy. Check them now!
password_db_desc: This page shows all registered users and is for demonstration purposes only.
name: Name
profile_picture_restored_to_default: Your profile picture has been restored to the default.
status_management_desc: Share a 24-hour status with your followers.
no_active_status_desc: Share an update with your customers!
caption_placeholder: Add a caption to your status...
media_is_required: Media is required for a status.
reactions_on_your_status_desc: See who loved your latest update.
no_reactions_yet_desc: Check back later to see who has reacted.
delete_status_warning: This will permanently delete your current status and all its reactions.
camera_access_denied_desc: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
